title: SHANNAN BOWEN DID A REPORT BACK IN JULY ON A BANK ROBBEY AT RBC CERTURA BANK ON MARKET ST.THE MAN THEY THINK DID IT IS MY LONG LOST BROTHER JIMMY STEWART WE HAVEN\'T SEEN HIM FOR 20 YRS.BEEN LOOKING FOR HIM THE PAST 5YRS TO TELL HIM ABOUT HIS BRITH MOTHER AND THAT WE LOVE HIM AND ARE HERE FOR HIM. PLEASE HELP US TO FIND OUT HOW TO GET IN TOUCH WITH HIM OR THE NEW HANOVER POLICE IN WILMINGTON N.C. THANK YOU  GINA KRUMHOLTZ
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.newhanoversheriff.com/
